item.title: CVE-2024-33916|2024-05-03T07:18:23.860Z -- MachoThemes -- CPO Companion
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MachoThemes CPO Companion allows Stored XSS.This issue affects CPO Companion: from n/a through 1.1.0.
